description: Try our easy to follow Homemade Chicken Schnitzel & Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken salad,Tree nut free,Healthier Easier,Tomato,Chicken,Peanut free
name: Homemade Chicken Schnitzel & Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 small chicken breast fillets, split crossways
0.25 cup canned no added salt corn kernels

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200oC/180oC fan-forced. Line a baking tray with baking paper.
Mix cheddar and breadcrumbs in a shallow bowl. Place flour and egg in separate shallow bowls.

Place each piece of chicken between two layers of baking paper, pound out lightly with a rolling pin to flatten to 5mm thick. Working with one piece at a time, coat chicken in flour, then dip in egg and coat in breadcrumb mixture. Place chicken on tray. Spray with oil.
Bake for 15 minutes. Turn chicken pieces and spray lightly with oil. Bake for a further 10 minutes or until golden.
Combine carrot, cucumber, tomato, parsley, lettuce, watermelon and corn in a large bowl. Divide salad among plates, dollop with ricotta and serve with schnitzel.
